import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ProfileService } from 'src/app/_services/profile.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-projects', templateUrl: './projects.component.html', styleUrls: ['./projects.component.scss'] }) export class ProjectsComponent implements OnInit{ projects:any; constructor(private profileService:ProfileService){} ngOnInit(): void { this.projects = this.profileService.getProjects() } }
